text: The Bayernliga is the highest football league in Bavaria. It can be translated as Bavarian league. Bayernliga may also refer to: ==Football== *Bayernliga: The fifth tier of the German football league system *Under 19 Fußball- Bayernliga: A youth football league in Bavaria for under 19 year olds *Under 17 Fußball-Bayernliga: A youth football league in Bavaria for under 17 year olds *Under 15 Fußball-Bayernliga: A youth football league in Bavaria for under 15 year olds ==Ice hockey== *Bayernliga: Highest ice hockey league in Bavaria
title: Bayernliga (disambiguation)
